name: ShapeMagnet
description:
Welcome to ShapeMagnet! In this neon world you will be a shapeshifting shape! To escape this world you will have to collect all "keys" to open the portal. Shapeshift through the other shapes that are trying to get you, and try not to touch anything else!

Instructions:

1- Use arrows to move around
2- Press 1 to turn into a square
3- Press 2 to turn into a triangle
4- Press 3 to turn into a star

Tools:
Engine - Unity
Graphics - Inkscape
SFX - Bfxr
Etc - Trello, Toggl

Recommended BGM:

I'm sorry there is no BGM, I actually tried to make something, but I just didn't have enough time... Also sorry for the project being so big, don't know what happened there O.o

I hope you enjoy playing it! And remember to comment so I can play your game too!!

Congratulations to all!!
